page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster028 filerz1567 Incident Notification
incidents.message: There has been an incident with our web hosting in GRA, customers in the affected area may have experienced some difficulties. Please see below for details: Start time : 27/01/2025 15:05 UTC End time : 27/01/2025 16:10 UTC Service impact : Customer may have had maintenance message on the cluster Cluster028. Root cause : Storage software malfunction. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster006
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on the Cluster006 has been resolved since 11:45 UTC . All the services are operational. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 27/01/2025 11:30 UTC End time : 27/01/2025 11:45 UTC Service impact : FTP and SSH were unavailable on this Cluster. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a malfunction on a sofrware. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident..

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [Global][Web Cloud] - MySQL 8.0 Database Upgrade maintenance
incidents.message: Update : 100 more containers have been upgraded. We will begin to increase the number of containers being upgraded on a daily basis. Please note that upgrades will continue to be conducted from Monday to Thursday, as usual.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [GRA3][WebHosting] - Maintenance notification for multiple Filerz
incidents.message:
Due to an incident that occurred at the same time, the end of maintenance on two clusters had to be cancelled: 
Cluster028 - Filerz1575
Cluster031 - Filerz1672
We can confirm that the other three have been completed without any problems.

We will inform you when the rest of the maintenance has been rescheduled.
Thank you for your understanding
